thread.title: Τουρκία: Εντάλματα σύλληψης για ακόμα 53 στρατιωτικούς
thread.title_full: Τουρκία: Εντάλματα σύλληψης για ακόμα 53 στρατιωτικούς

posts.author: ekyriakidou
posts.title: Τουρκία: Εντάλματα σύλληψης για ακόμα 53 στρατιωτικούς
posts.text:
- A + A 
Τούρκος εισαγγελέας εξέδωσε εντάλματα σύλληψης εναντίον 53 εν ενεργεία αξιωματικών του στρατού που θεωρούνται ύποπτοι για διασυνδέσεις με τον ιεροκήρυκα Φετουλάχ Γκιουλέν, τον οποίο ο Ερντογάν θεωρεί ενορχηστρωτή του αποτυχημένου πραξικοπήματος, μετέδωσαν σήμερα τα κρατικά μέσα ενημέρωσης. 
Είκοσι από τους υπόπτους έχουν μέχρι στιγμής συλληφθεί στο πλαίσιο της επιχείρησης που διεξήχθη σε 12 επαρχίες, μετέδωσε το κρατικό πρακτορείο ειδήσεων Anadolu, ενώ 33 άλλοι στρατιωτικοί καταζητούνται. 
Το υπουργείο Εσωτερικών ανακοίνωσε χθες Δευτέρα ότι σχεδόν 700 άνθρωποι συνελήφθησαν την περασμένη εβδομάδα ως ύποπτοι γκιουλενιστές. 
Περίπου 50.000 άνθρωποι έχουν συλληφθεί μετά το αποτυχημένο πραξικόπημα του Ιουλίου και σχεδόν 150.000 έχουν απολυθεί ή τεθεί σε διαθεσιμότητα, περιλαμβανομένων στρατιωτικών, αστυνομικών, καθηγητών και δημοσίων υπαλλήλων, για πιθανές διασυνδέσεις με τον Γκιουλέν. 
Ο Γκιουλέν, ο οποίος είναι αυτοεξόριστος στην Πενσιλβάνια των ΗΠΑ από το 1999, αρνείται κάθε ανάμειξη. 
Οργανώσεις για τα ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα και ορισμένοι δυτικοί σύμμαχοι εκφράζουν φόβους ότι ο πρόεδρος Ερντογάν χρησιμοποιεί το πραξικόπημα ως δικαιολογία για να καταστείλει το κίνημα των διαφωνούντων. Η κυβέρνηση από την πλευρά της υποστηρίζει ότι οι επιχειρήσεις εκκαθάρισης είναι απαραίτητες εξαιτίας της σοβαρότητας της απόπειρας ανατροπής της κυβέρνησης, κατά την οποία έχασαν τη ζωή τους 240 άνθρωποι στις 15 Ιουλίου 2016. 
Πηγή: ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ

ΟΛΑ ΤΑ ΕΠΕΙΣΟΔΙΑ ΤΗΣ ΣΕΙΡΑΣ ΚΛΙΚ ΕΔΩ  [post_ads] Μην Αρχίζεις τη Μουρμούρα επεισόδιο 12 - 5ος κύκλος 

Συναγερμός στο χωριό από μια βόμβα που βρέθηκε θαμμένη σ’ ένα χωράφι. Η κατάσταση επείγει και κανονίζεται εκκένωση του χωριού την επόμενη μέρα, μέχρι να εξουδετερωθεί. thread.title: Attributes Of Great Pillow Manufacturers
thread.title_full: Attributes Of Great Pillow Manufacturers

posts.author: putri silpany (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Attributes Of Great Pillow Manufacturers
posts.text:
By Ruth Cook 

When people are tired from work, they would like to have enough and proper rest; this is one of the standard things to all individuals. People must sleep for some hours of the day. Some do not enjoy such activity because they do not have proper cushions to support their heads adequately. If you want to buy a comfortable pillow, you would have to look for right Pillow Manufacturers . Do not just buy one because you saw it while passing. You should know the following features of right cushions manufactures.

To know that one is good for you, reliability is the key. This attributes must be observed in any of the professionals in that field. When one has decided to do such a business, he or she should aim at getting the customers both old and new satisfied. They have to be reliable by most individuals as they struggle to live up the promises of satisfying the buyers.

Capabilities. Apart from the above attribute, their abilities not only in production but also in supplying will determine they greatness. Customers might not be able to go to the manufacturing sites to get what they want due to things like long distances. Thus, best ones must have means of delivery to where those products are demanded.

Communication is essential to them. The professionals have put proper measures to ensure clienteles are being informed and updated on any developments in the items manufactured. They have provided sufficient information on websites where the customers can easily find and read. Responses to the consumers are made on time and in a very proper manner; this is a feature, which most producers do overlook, but for the best ones, it is necessary to them.

Manufacturing should involve varieties. This is the feature which makes this business to continue improving each day. When one has many customers, will mean, many people get their desires for that business person. Thus, the products manufactured are of different sizes, shapes, and various sponginess among other things. This ensures that clients get their preferences at any time they want.

Adaptability. Exceptional industrialists must be good at adapting to new changes which come on their way. There are some standards which change in their lines of business. For instance, technology is advancing day in day out, and so they have to move with it to remain ahead of the rest. Therefore, they are flexible and can adopt emerging practices and will be willing to work on developing a new process to ensure continuous production and satisfaction of buyers.

The prices, which they charge, are affordable to most clients. Buyers are mostly affected by the costs of the products. A right industrialist knows that overcharging the consumers is unethical practices. Since it might discourage persons from coming for their items, they will make sure the prices are moderate; this helps them to maintain and get new buyers.

The experts are registered. They are in the forefront following the laws of federal governments. They have valid licenses for their businesses. Since not all of them are willing to endure the procedural ways of getting the permits, some can operate without them. Thus, those displaying their licenses are the best.




About the Author:

Get a list of important things to consider when choosing pillow manufacturers and more information about a reputable manufacturer at http://www.adorablepillows.com now.

posts.author: 김소희 기자
posts.title: CJ헬스케어에 불어 닥친 사모펀드 인수설…분위기 '뒤숭숭'
posts.text: CJ제일제당이 제약사업을 영위하고 있는 계열사 CJ헬스케어를 매각하겠다고 결정한 가운데, 인수전에 사모펀드사가 뛰어들었다는 CJ헬스케어 내부 분위기가 뒤숭숭하다. <한국정책신문DB> [한국정책신문=김소희 기자] CJ헬스케어가 뒤숭숭한 분위기다. CJ제일제당이 제약사업 계열사인 CJ헬스케어 매각을 결정한가운데, 글로벌 제약사가 아닌 사모펀드가 인수할 것이라는얘기가 회자되고 있다. 사모펀드는 기업 인수 후 단기수익을 위해 통상적으로 인력을 줄이는 터라,직원들의 고민도 깊어지고 있다. 7일 관련업계에 따르면 CJ제일제당의 CJ헬스케어 매각결정에 일부 직원들은 향후 거취를 두고 복잡한 심경을 토로하고 있다. CJ헬스케어의 한 영업사원은 "아직 확정된 게 하나도 없는데, 회사 매각과 관련해 온갖 추측이 난무하고 있다"며 우리조차 상황파악이 제대로 안 되고 있어 업계의 관심이 부담스러운 게 사실"이라고 말했다. 또 영업사원은 "어떻게 해야 할지 아무것도 모르겠다. 아무 일 없듯이 평소처럼 일하라고 하는데 일이 손에 잡히질 않는다" "지금부터 이직을 준비해야 하는 건지 걱정만 늘고 있다"고 사모펀드 인수설이 돌면서 후폭풍은 상당할 것이란 풀이도 나오고 있다. 사모펀드의 경우, 기업 인수 후 단기수익을 내기 위한 투자에 때문에 비용이 많이 투입되는 인력을 줄이는 인력효율화를 우선 추진할 것으로 업계는 예상하고

posts.text:
Reach out to agencies and offer to take on overflow work. Now is an especially good time to do so as clients are pushing to renew budgets, putting out a ton of RFPs, and badgering agencies to get projects wrapped up to launch next year.
More often than not, agencies will tap their pools of freelancers that they have doing overflow/clearing backlog for long term employment *before* simply putting out a job listing. It's lower-risk hiring for them to bring in proven candidates who already have experience working for them than hiring a total unknown who just walks in and hands them a resume.

thread.title: The difference between an accountant and a tax agent | The Daily Advertiser
thread.title_full: The difference between an accountant and a tax agent | The Daily Advertiser

posts.author: Noel Whittaker
posts.title: The difference between an accountant and a tax agent | The Daily Advertiser
posts.text:
twitter TWEET Personal finance expert Noel Whittaker answers your money questions. 
I am over 70. This year I stopped travelling to my accountant to have my tax return done and instead went to a registered tax agent who has a prominent office. Would you give me your opinion as to whether I did the right thing? How old does one need to be before we stop lodging a tax return if our income is $51,000 and below. 
There is no age over which you no longer have to lodge income tax return - it is a question of whether you receive taxable income or are entitled to a refund of tax paid. 
Anyone who charges a fee to prepare income tax returns has to be a registered tax agent - no accounting qualification can override this requirement. 
Tax agents are registered by the government, and need to be of good character, keep up to date, and have professional indemnity insurance. They also have to have completed relevant courses in tax law, have at least 12 months' supervised experience preparing income tax returns, and lodge a variety of tax returns each year. 
The key is to find a good one. If they do not ask a lot of questions, or encourage you to ask questions, it may be a sign they don't have confidence in their knowledge or ability to answer what comes out of a discussion. This should be more of a concern than whether they call themselves an accountant or a tax agent. 
In the 2017/2018 tax year if both a husband and wife have taxable incomes below $37,000 can they each make a $3000 contribution to the other's super fund and claim the $540 tax offset or can only one partner take advantage of this option? 
The spouse contribution tax offset can be claimed by each member of the couple. If both of them are on a low to medium income, and can qualify, they can each get an offset of $540 if they each make a spouse contribution on behalf of each other. 
Can you please explain how the government guarantee for bank savings up to $250,000 works and what accounts and entities are covered? In what circumstances would this guarantee be used and is it reliable to get 100 per cent of your money back in a timely period? How careful do you think consumers should be about not having more than $250,000 in any one bank/credit union, and is it worth the effort and security to spread funds across different entities? 
The Australian government has guaranteed deposits up to $250,000 in authorised deposit-taking institutions (ADIs) such as banks, building societies and credit unions. This means that this money is guaranteed if anything happens to the ADI. The cap applies per ADI so a person would be fully protected if there were $250,000 in two institutions but only $250,000 would be protected if there were $500,000 in one institution. 
Just bear in mind that if a bank went broke the shareholders would be the last to be paid. This means the shares in a bank that did go broke would become worthless - imagine the effect on the sharemarket and everybody's superannuation if that happened. In my mind, a much bigger risk is leaving too much money in cash or term deposits where its value is being continually eroded by inflation and often by income tax. 
If my spouse and I die at the same time with each other as binding beneficiaries of our respective super amounts what would happen to our super payouts? We have two now non-dependent children and obviously want to legally keep the Tax Office from taxing the amount. 
In the situation you mention, the trustee of your fund will decide where the assets go. And, yes, if they are non-dependents, the death tax of 15 per cent plus Medicare levy would be applied to the taxable component of your superannuation accounts. The only way out is to withdraw the money tax-free before you die. If you are envisaging a situation where you may both die in an airline crash, keep in mind that life insurance is fairly cheap to cover that contingency. 
Noel Whittaker is the author of Making Money Made Simple and numerous other books on personal finance. His advice is general in nature. Readers should seek their own professional advice before making decisions. Twitter: @noelwhittaker

thread.title: 26 Nigerians women in tragic end on Mediterranean
thread.title_full: 26 Nigerians women in tragic end on Mediterranean

posts.author: PARROTSNEWS
posts.title: 26 Nigerians women in tragic end on Mediterranean
posts.text:
November 2017 By Braide Damiete with agency report
Italian prosecutors are investigating the deaths of 26 Nigerian women, most of them teenagers whose bodies were recovered at sea.
There are suspicions that they may have been sexually abused and murdered as they attempted to cross the Mediterranean.
Five migrants are already being questioned in the southern port of Salerno. A Spanish warship, Cantabria, docked there, carrying 375 migrants and the dead women, following several rescues.
Twenty-three of the dead women had been on a rubber boat with 64 other people.
Italian media reports that the women’s bodies are being kept in a refrigerated section of the warship.
Most of them were aged 14-18.
Most of the 375 survivors brought to Salerno were sub-Saharan Africans, from Nigeria, Senegal, Ghana, The Gambia and Sudan, the daily La Repubblica reports. Among them were 90 women, eight of them pregnant and 52 children.
There were also some Libyan men and women on board.
People-smuggling gangs charge each migrant about $6,000 (£4,578) to get to Italy, $4,000 of which is for the trans-Saharan journey to Libya, according to the Italian aid group L’Abbraccio.
Many migrants have reported violence, including torture and sexual abuse, by the gangs. So far this year,, 150,982 migrants arrived in southern Europe by boat from North Africa, the International Organisation for Migration (IOM) reports.
Of that number, 111,552 (nearly 75 percent) came via the Central Mediterranean route to Italy. The number who died on that route was 2,639, the IOM says.
Others arrived in Greece, Cyprus or Spain. The total is less than half the 335,158 who arrived in the same period of 2016.
Last year the total for Greece was higher than that for Italy.

When the couple secretly weds against their parents' wishes, the consequence shakes the very foundation and sustenance of both families. 4. "The Bridge" is Chidinma Ekile’s feature film debut. The singer plays Stella alongside  "October 1"  and  "Jemeji"  actor, Demola Adedoyin, who plays Obadare. 5. The movie will make its debut on December 8, 2017.

thread.title: Il fallimento dello storytelling - Telcoeye di Massimo Cavazzini Telcoeye di Massimo Cavazzini
thread.title_full: Il fallimento dello storytelling - Telcoeye di Massimo Cavazzini Telcoeye di Massimo Cavazzini

posts.title: Il fallimento dello storytelling - Telcoeye di Massimo Cavazzini Telcoeye di Massimo Cavazzini
posts.text:
Scrive Nicola Mattina su Facebook: “ Nel 2009, quando mi occupavo di Working Capital, con Salvo Mizzi e Gianluca Dettori ci dicevamo che occorreva raccontare l’innovazione e che questo avrebbe contribuito a far nascere anche in Italia un florido ecosistema di startup. Ho organizzato e partecipato a molte iniziative con entusiasmo e convinzione. Barcamp, ignite, challenge di open innovation, programmi di accelerazione e via di seguito. Ormai ho perso il conto. 
A distanza di anni, non posso che constatare un sostanziale fallimento di quella visione. L’Italia (e per molti versi l’intera Europa) non è un buon terreno di coltura per un’innovazione digitale che possa in qualche modo competere con quella prodotta negli Stati Uniti (o in Cina). Il vantaggio in termini di know-how e capitali è incolmabile e – con lo sviluppo dell’intelligenza artificiale – lo sarà ancora di più. 
Negli ultimi dieci anni, nonostante gli sforzi, in Italia non è nato alcun ecosistema dell’innovazione digitale. Quello che è fiorito, invece, è un piccolo sistema di organizzatori di eventi che si parlano addosso e invitano politici e manager di aziende in mercati poco competitivi a inaugurazioni e celebrazioni. ” 
Chi legge questo blog da anni, sa che sono sempre stato scettico sull’eccessivo storytelling, quel “pompare” artificialmente le storie pensando che magicamente un asino potesse diventare un purosangue se raccontato sufficientemente bene. E le (infinite) discussioni con, tra gli altri, Riccardo Luna sull’agomento lo dimostrano. 
Credo che l’errore principale sia stato il tentativo di fare innovazione attraverso gli eventi e attraverso lo storytelling . L’innovazione non nasce dagli eventi, al limite gli eventi possono aiutare a disseminare un’informazione, a darne visibilità, a creare un fondo culturale comune su cui innestare innovazione. Invece abbiamo vissuto l’illusione che una storia ben raccontata potesse essere innovazione essa stessa . 
E non abbiamo imparato molto in questi ultimi dieci anni, se è vero che molti tendono ancora oggi a credere al “ miracolo dell’uomo venuto dagli States ” (mi riferisco ovviamente al commissario straordinario Diego Piacentini) che, con bacchetta magica, senza budget e grazie a un’ottima comunicazione, possa magicamente cambiare un Paese arretrato culturalmente e digitalmente. Per fortuna, dal raccontare risultati inesistenti in 6 mesi siamo tornati ad un dibattito più serio, ovvero cosa riusciremo a fare in cinque anni (orizzonte più ragionevole) e a che condizioni. 
Scimmiottare la Silicon Valley o i distretti hi tech esteri, nell’immaginario collettivo dello story telling, avrebbe dovuto portare il Paese nell’epoca degli unicorni. Non è successo. Troppe le differenze per applicare quei modelli qui da noi: la cultura del rischio non esiste , in Italia. Inutile girarci intorno, se fallisci sei un cretino. Se ci provi e non ce la fai, sei un fallito. La sana competizione sul mercato è spesso mal vista, la cultura del lavoro e il miraggio del posto fisso e sicuro nella Pubblica Amministrazione sono ancora predominanti. E la mobilità tra aziende rimane bassa, perchè chi perde un lavoro sa che farà fatica a trovarne un altro. La cultura digitale è bassissima . Un Paese dove Internet è ancora per pochi e dove il livello di digitalizzazione è ai minimi livelli. Il sistema di venture capitalism è praticamente inesistente , ci sono pochissimi capitali di rischio che circolano, gli affari si fanno su business solidi e saldamente “aggrappati” alla politica (pensiamo al business dei rifiuti, agli appalti nella PA, alle infrastrutture). Perchè investire su iniziative rischiose quando la telefonata al politico di turno assicura un ritorno sicuro del capitale? Una burocrazia asfissiante , dove qualsiasi procedura, progetto, iniziativa deve passare tra carte bollatre, notai, commercialisti, fisco, leggi, leggine e regolamenti. Il tessuto aziendale italiano è fatto da piccole e medie imprese , spesso con bassa propensione al rischio e all’innovazione. Il divario tra le diverse aree del Paese , in questa Italia dei mille campanili dove anzichè favorire la nascita di un grande polo nazionale (c’è a malapena spazio per uno, quasi sicramente non per due… e noi miriamo ad averne una ventina) ognuno pensa al proprio piccolo orticello Un sistema scolastico e universitario troppo lontano dal mercato , troppo lontano dalle aziende, ingessato e poco dinamico. Anche qui, anzichè favorire le eccellenze si tende a mantenere la miriade di università medio piccole, zavorrando quelle che potrebbero volare alto. 
La soluzione non è facile, non è immediata, non è indolore. Riformare significa incontrare resistenze, in qualsiasi settore si affronti il problema. Raccontarlo fa male, è meno sexy e coinvolgente dello storytelling dove è tutto meraviglioso e chiunque ce la può fare a diventare Facebook (magari! ma il mondo reale dice che pochissimi ce la fanno), ma è l’unico modo per cercare di avanzare. Fino al prossimo convegno, almeno.

posts.title: Son dakika... Şile'de batan gemiden bir acı haber daha
posts.text:
Son dakika... Şile'de batan gemiden bir acı haber daha 07.11.2017 Salı 12:20 (Güncellendi: 07.11.2017 Salı 12:31) Son dakika... Şile'de batan gemiden bir acı haber daha CNN TÜRK Şile açıklarında batan geminin kayıp mürettebatından 4'üncü kişinin de cesedine ulaşıldı. metin boyutu 
Gemlik'ten Karadeniz Ereğli'ye giden demir yüklü "Bilal Bal" isimli kuru yük gemisinin batması sonucu Sahil Güvenlik Komutanlığı, Kıyı Emniyeti Genel Müdürlüğü ve Deniz Kuvvetleri Komutanlığı'nca başlatılan kayıp mürettebatı arama çalışmaları 7. gününde devam ediyor. 
Bugün yapılan çalışmalar sırasında 1 kişinin daha cesedine ulaşıldı. Acı haberi Şile Kaymakamı Salih Yüce verdi. Daha önce yapılan aramalarda 3 mürettebatın cansız bedenlerine ulaşılarak çıkarılmıştı. Şile'de kayıp mürettebatı arama çalışmalarında 6. gün 
Ne olmuştu? 
Bursa’nın Gemlik ilçesindeki Roda Port Limanı’ndan geçtiğimiz Cuma günü 15.30’da demir tozu yükleyip Karadeniz Ereğli Limanı’na gitmek için yola çıkan Bilal Bal’a ait olduğu öğrenilen 78,5 metre uzunluğunda 13 metre genişliğindeki kargo gemisi İstanbul Şile açıklarında battı. Gemi battıktan sonra hidrostatik fırlatma ile serbest kalarak yüzeye çıktıktan sonra uydu aracılığıyla sinyal gönderen EPIRB adlı cihazdan sinyal alındığı öğrenildi. Gelen haberlere göre Kıyı Emniyeti’ne bağlı 2 adet hızlı tahlisiye botu ile TCSG 74 adlı Sahil Güvenlik botu sabah saat 05.00’ten itibaren olay yerinde arama-kurtarma faaliyeti yürütüyor. EPIRB sinyalinin saat 04.00 civarında geldiği bildiriliyor. Geminin battığı tahmine edilen bölgede boş sandallar ve can yelekleri bulunmuştu.

OM – Caen : Quelle heure ? Quelle chaîne ? 

Interrogé par le quotidien l’Equipe, l’ancien défenseur de l’OM et champion du monde 1998, Marcel Desailly s’est confié sur le cas Evra. L’OM et la commission de discipline de l’UEFA devraient prendre une décision ce vendredi. 
Les joueurs de foot doivent être exemplaires – Dessailly 


« A partir du moment où vous êtes dans un stade de football, vous devez faire attention aux supporters qui parfois font des choses assez folles. Les joueurs de foot doivent être exemplaires. Mais chacun en pense ce qu’il veut. L’UEFA et la Fédération française vont décider ce qu’il faut faire après cet incident. Marseille l’a déjà mis à pied. Chacun sait qu’il faut garder son calme sur le terrain. Je suis triste, il a eu une énorme carrière, je n’aimerais pas le voir finir sur ça. Il a ses raisons. J’espère qu’il s’excusera et qu’il pourra passer à autre chose ensuite. » Marcel Desailly – source : L’Equipe. Info OM et actu des transferts avec Foot Club de Marseille

thread.title: Tighter laws a ‘Band-aid’ for domestic violence | The Daily Advertiser
thread.title_full: Tighter laws a ‘Band-aid’ for domestic violence | The Daily Advertiser

posts.author: Steff Wills
posts.title: Tighter laws a ‘Band-aid’ for domestic violence | The Daily Advertiser
posts.text:
twitter TWEET 
A call to restrict Wagga’s licensed premises in the fight against a domestic violence scourge has been shot down by a former victim. 
The 43-year-old’s harrowing tale of abuse and survival comes amid a Domestic Violence Death Review recommendation this week to place tighter restrictions on pub trading hours and the building of new facilities in areas with high rates of family violence. Wagga's hot spots for incidents of domectic assault from Jul 2016 to Jun 2017 
Various locations across the city were identified as hot spots, with more than 350 domestic assaults reported between June 2016 and 2017, according to the Bureau of Crime Statistics and Research . 
The former Wagga woman – who was afraid to be identified – said restrictions on licensed premises could help a little but it would be a “token gesture” and a “Band-aid”. 
Related: Calls to cut pub licenses to curb domestic violence 
She said alcoholism was not the heart of the matter. 
“Respect for others has to be taught from day dot,” she said. “No amount of restrictions will make a difference … we can’t become a police state.” 
She said education was key. 
“We need to change the mindset of young people,” she said. “Not just at school but at home too.” 
When the 43-year-old had moved to Wagga in 1995, with her then husband – a policeman – she had no idea he would become the catalyst of a never-ending nightmare. 
The memories of being beaten black and blue, being publicly belittled and having every aspect of her life controlled still brought tears to her eyes. 
“Alcohol is the tip of the iceberg when it comes to domestic violence,” she said. “There are so many other issues that contribute to this insidious problem.” 
The former Wagga woman’s abuser would clock her trip to and from work, questioning a minute’s lateness. He would put her down in a crowd, openly grope other women and hit her if he was unhappy. 
One night, she said she felt so hopeless and useless, she had waited in the dark with a knife in her hand 
“If I heard a sound, I was going to start slashing at the night,” she said. “I just thought: ‘What have I got? I’ve got nothing, I’m nothing’.” 
She said the lack of support she received from her husband’s police colleagues had made matters worse. 
When her boss saw his employee coming to work with black eyes, he offered his home as a safe haven. 
“That’s when I realised I wasn’t really alone,” she said. “It gave me the guts to get up and leave.” 
After 19-months of abuse, the young woman was able to move away, but she said the scars had stayed with her for more than two decades. 
Now at 43-years old, the Sydney woman said she couldn't really trust anyone. 
To others living in a similar hell, she said: “Speak to someone you trust; someone who you look up to, who will listen … not someone who will push you away or put it in the too hard basket”. 
If you or someone you know is experiencing domestics violence and needs help, call the Wagga Women’s Health Centre on (02) 6921 3333.

thread.title: 究竟雞蛋同牛奶對人體係咪真係有益？
thread.title_full: 究竟雞蛋同牛奶對人體係咪真係有益？ - 香港高登討論區

posts.author: 冇聊人
posts.text:
蛋唔知，但牛奶真係過分比商家吹棒左好多年，我覺得係bb先會吸收，大個飲唔飲都罷，同埋人就應該飲番人奶。
咁肉呢? 人又應該食返人肉? 人不嬲可以係不同來源吸收營養, 羊奶呢? 蒙古人係飲羊奶大WO, 仲打到全世界叫黃禍
根本上用黃種人自古以黎 GE 飲食習慣黎反駁 唔應該飲牛奶, 根本係OFF
冇人叫你日日飲牛奶好似當水飲, 飲適量GE話對人體好處更多
好似有人check DNA發現嗰時全部蒙古人都冇乳糖不耐症

posts.author: 詭異的簡雍
posts.text:
想問下, 如果想吸引充份鈣質, 唔飲牛奶, 可以飲咩?
豆類、堅果、西蘭花、沙甸魚都有鈣
所以飲嘅話豆奶豆漿、杏仁露之類都幾好
當然食糖水揀花生糊、芝麻糊又係好選擇
另外仲有其他營養幫助吸收鈣質
例如維他命D，蛋黃有好多，得閒曬一曬太陽人體會自己製造
鎂、鋅呢D有就得，唔使太多，食下南瓜呢D多微量元素嘅食品就好好

thread.title_full: 장훈 감독도 억울함 호소? "'사랑은 없다'에서 성적으로 만지라 한 적 없다"

posts.author: 전지혜 기자
posts.title: 장훈 감독도 억울함 호소? "'사랑은 없다'에서 성적으로 만지라 한 적 없다"
posts.text:
HOME 장훈 감독도 억울함 호소? "'사랑은 없다'에서 성적으로 만지라 한 적 없다" 사진=유튜브캡처 

[한국정책신문=전지혜 기자] 영화 ' 없다'의 연출을 맡은 장훈 감독의 조덕제 성추행 사건에 대한 입장표명에 관심이 몰리고 있다. 
지난 1일 장훈 감독은 복수의 언론을 통해 억울함을 호소했다. 그는 "최근 공개된 메이킹 필름 영상은 악의적으로 것"이라며 "조덕제가 '도와달라'고 호소하던 눈물의 얼굴 뒤로 나를 모함할 계략을 꾸미고 있었다"고 주장했다. 이어 "어쩔 수 없이 한마디 한 것을 도둑 반강압적인 진술서 등을 가지고 장난친다"며 "15년 만에 재기를 꿈꾸며 만들었던 작품이 이렇게 사약으로 돌아왔다"고 말했다. 
또한 장훈 감독은 "상의 속옷을 찢으라는 지시는 했지만 사전에 약속된 동선과 카메라 사이즈

好信唔信走去信d短命種國家既節目。（無記錯既話美國係top 10不入）
同健康無關的
我就唔信日日OT唔做運動既港奴可以健康
論天災同唔駛勞役(非文職)已經死少好多人
診所又多，藥房又多，又唔駛打仗，示威搞到咁多日都可以無死過人

如果放誅正常人口既城市/國家，人口比例壽命率即刻唔同晒

thread.title_full: 에픽게임즈 '언리얼 서밋 2017' 성공적 마무리

posts.author: 천민지 기자
posts.title: 에픽게임즈 '언리얼 서밋 2017' 성공적 마무리
posts.text:
에픽게임즈 코리아는 '시작해요 언리얼 제주'를 끝으로 '언리얼 서밋 2017'을 성공적으로 마무리했다고 사진은 언리얼 서밋 프리미엄 2017 행사 진행 모습. <에픽게임즈 코리아 제공> 
기자] 게임개발사이자 게임엔진 개발사인 에픽게임즈의 한국법인 에픽게임즈 코리아(대표 박성철)는 '시작해요 언리얼 제주'를끝으로 '언리얼 서밋 2017'을 성공적으로 마무리했다고 7일 밝혔다. 
회사는 '시작해요 언리얼 제주'를 지난 2일 제주벤처마루에서 개최했다. 행사는 비(非)수도권 지역 개발자들을 찾아가는 언리얼 엔진 기술 세미나 '시작해요 언리얼 전국투어'의 일환이다. 
올해 찾은 회사는 △언리얼엔진4에서 3ds 맥스(디자인 소프트웨어) 등의 외부 데이터를 작업하는 데 필요한 개발 방법△언리얼 엔진 가상현실(VR)과 인터랙션 제작법 △언리얼 엔진을 이용한 효율적인 시네마틱/애니메이션 제작법 등의 세션을 진행했다. 
4월부터 11월까지 8개월에 걸쳐

thread.title: IL TEAM TREK-SEGAFREDO SCEGLIE SANTINI CYCLING WEAR - PedalaPedala
thread.title_full: IL TEAM TREK-SEGAFREDO SCEGLIE SANTINI CYCLING WEAR - PedalaPedala

posts.title: IL TEAM TREK-SEGAFREDO SCEGLIE SANTINI CYCLING WEAR - PedalaPedala
posts.text:
Home » Attrezzatura » Abbigliamento » IL TEAM TREK-SEGAFREDO SCEGLIE SANTINI CYCLING WEAR IL TEAM TREK-SEGAFREDO SCEGLIE SANTINI CYCLING WEAR Pubblicato da Marco in Abbigliamento , Attrezzatura 7 novembre 2017 Commenti disabilitati su IL TEAM TREK-SEGAFREDO SCEGLIE SANTINI CYCLING WEAR 30 Visite 
Dal 2018 Santini Cycling Wear sarà partner tecnico della formazione World Tour Trek-Segafredo . L’avvio della collaborazione è stato ufficializzato oggi in occasione della fiera londinese Rouleur Classic: l’evento ha fatto da cornice alla presentazione della nuova collaborazione motivo di grande orgoglio per entrambi i partner. 
L’evento fieristico Rouleur Classic che si è aperto ieri a Londra, è stato quest’oggi cornice della presentazione ufficiale della partnership tra Santini Cycling Wear e il team World Tour Trek-Segafredo. L’azienda italiana di abbigliamento tecnico per il ciclismo vestirà gli atleti della squadra a partire dal 2018. 
Nel 2018, Il team Trek-Segafredo sarà composto da 28 atleti di 18 nazionalità diverse. Tra questi, lo sprinter tedesco John Degenkolb e l’italiano Fabio Felline che hanno preso parte alla presentazione ufficiale di oggi a Londra. 
«Siamo orgogliosi che una squadra di altissimo livello come il team Trek-Segafredo ci abbia scelto – dichiara Paola Santini , marketing manager di Santini Cycling Wear – apprezzando la tecnicità e qualità dei nostri capi capaci di soddisfare le esigenze dei corridori sia in allenamento che durante le competizioni». 
Luca Guercilena , General Manager di Trek-Segafredo: « Con oltre 50 anni di esperienza, Santini ha sviluppato un patrimonio di conoscenze e know-how che la rendono un punto di riferimento internazionale nell’abbigliamento tecnico per il ciclismo. La parte tecnica è però sono un aspetto di questa partnership, infatti è il supporto fornito ad essere cruciale per noi. Santini sa bene cosa significhi essere partner tecnico di una squadra World Tour e gareggiare in ogni luogo del mondo con qualsiasi condizione atmosferica. Sin dal nostro primo incontro, abbiamo capito che Santini sarebbe stato in grado di anticipare le nostre esigenze, individuare cosa per noi è importante e consegnare rapidamente i capi richiesti. Sono infatti sicuro che questa partnership sarà di grande successo». 
La partnership si declinerà nella fornitura di tutti capi, sia tecnici che casual, disegnati appositamente per gli atleti della squadra: «Non si tratta di un impegno nuovo per noi: la nostra azienda, infatti, ha una lunga storia in fatto di “vestizione” di squadre professionistiche – commenta Monica Santini , amministratore delegato di Santini Cycling Wear – e con la flessibilità che caratterizza la nostra linea di produzione a Bergamo, sia in termini di tempistiche sia di personalizzazione del capo sul singolo atleta, saremo in grado di soddisfare al meglio le esigenze del team Trek-Segafredo». 
Tra i capi forniti per test sul campo al team Trek-Segafredo, gli atleti hanno particolarmente apprezzato il calzoncino Impact, con inserti in tessuto Sitip realizzato con fibra anti-taglio e anti- abrasione Dyneema®. Lo stesso tessuto è stato scelto anche per lo sviluppo del body da strada che sarà in dotazione a tutta la squadra. 
I nuovi capi forninti da Santini al team Trek-Segafredo saranno presentati a dicembre 2017 e saranno disponibili nei negozi da gennaio 2018. 
Per maggiori informazioni: www.santinisms.it – www.treksegafredo.com Condividi:

thread.title: Long road ahead to address disability access across Wagga | The Daily Advertiser
thread.title_full: Long road ahead to address disability access across Wagga | The Daily Advertiser

posts.author: Steff Wills
posts.title: Long road ahead to address disability access across Wagga | The Daily Advertiser
posts.text:
He said to go for a ride, he was often forced to wheel his way down the centre of the street, to avoid veering to one side. Long road ahead to address disability access across Wagga Glenfield overpass. Footpath suddenly stops before connecting with the Fernleigh Road footpath. Corner of Kincaid Street and Gossett Street. Only one side of the intersection has a ramp down to the road. The other side is simply kerb. Corner of Rhoda Avenue and Shaw Street. Neither side of the road has a ramp from the footpath to the road. Jack Avenue, Mount Austin. The footpath fades into nature strip on both sides of the road. Jack Avenue, Mount Austin. The footpath fades into nature strip on both sides of the road. Messenger Avenue, Boorooma. Footpath ends before the playground. of Digging into the footpath problem 
Mr Farrell said most of the disabled parking was good, but he noted some allocated spots were not as wide as they should be. 
“Some are the same size as a normal park with the sign on it,” he said. “If someone is disabled they often need that extra space to manoeuvre in.” Wagga resident Makayla Grace shows the dangers of rolling a wheelchair behind a car in car parks (2016). Wagga resident Makayla Grace shows the dangers of rolling a wheelchair behind a car in car parks (2016). 
Better Mobility Wagga manager Austin Gregor said he could “see the progress” Wagga City Council were making, which was a “good thing”. 
“Is there a long way to go?” Mr Gregor said. “Yes. But the tide is turning.” 
He said the arrival of NDIS had improved awareness across the board, with residents, business owners, services, organisations and council representatives thinking about building better disabled access. 
“People are thinking about more than a disabled parking space and handrail,” Mr Gregor said. “They’re starting to recognise the need to cater for everyone.” 
Council’s social planning coordinator Lisa Saffery said it was committed to improving accessibility in Wagga and was working with services and stakeholders to develop a community access working party. 
Her words follow an audit of Baylis Street last week and come ahead of another audit of Fitsmaurice Street next week. 
“We’re working with community members to find out where there are barriers,” Ms Saffery said. “We’re making sure, where we can, that we are getting it right.” 
She said the development of adult change facilities were also on the way.

posts.title: “百名红通人员”贺俭回国投案 系十九大闭幕后首个_凤凰资讯
posts.text:
原标题：“百名红通人员”贺俭回国投案
2017年11月7日，在中央反腐败协调小组国际追逃追赃工作办公室的统筹协调下，经中央有关部门和河北省委、省纪委扎实工作、不懈努力，“百名红通人员”第68号贺俭回国投案。 这是党的十九大胜利闭幕后首个回国投案的“百名红通人员”。 目前，“百名红通人员”已到案49人。
贺俭
贺俭，男，河北港口集团原方大房地产公司经理，涉嫌贪污罪和单位行贿罪，2010年9月逃往加拿大。国际刑警组织红色通报号码A-7451/12-2011。贺俭外逃后，其巨额涉案资金已被冻结，将依法予以追缴。
习近平总书记在党的十九大报告中指出：坚持受贿行贿一起查；不管腐败分子逃到哪里，都要缉拿归案、绳之以法。再次向全世界表明了凡逃必追、一追到底的鲜明立场。中央追逃办负责人表示，贺俭归案是我们学习贯彻十九大精神，以实际行动落实党中央重大决策部署的具体体现，充分彰显了十九大后党中央对反腐败国际追逃追赃工作力度不减、节奏不变的坚定决心和必胜信心。追逃追赃工作是切断腐败分子退路、夺取反腐败斗争压倒性胜利的重要一环。我们将以一刻不停歇的精神状态，不松劲、不停步、再出发，让已经潜逃的无处藏身，让企图外逃的丢掉幻想。

thread.title: Sebab-sebab Dibolehkannya Operasi Plastik dalam Islam
thread.title_full: Sebab-sebab Dibolehkannya Operasi Plastik dalam Islam | Dream.co.id

posts.author: Ahmad Baiquni
posts.title: Sebab-sebab Dibolehkannya Operasi Plastik dalam Islam
posts.text:
Ulama melarang mengubah bentuk wajah atau tubuh.
Dream - Operasi plastik serta rekonstruksi wajah kini tengah menjadi tren. Orang-orang, terutama kaum hawa, berlomba untuk mempercantik diri dengan mengubah wajah sebagian atau keseluruhan ( face off ).
Islam sebenarnya melarang praktik operasi plastik. Hal ini dijelaskan oleh Ibnu Hajar Al Asqalani dalam kitabnya Fathul Bari Syarah Shahihil Bukhari.
Dikutip dari rubrik Syariah Nahdlatul Ulama, Ibnu Hajar mengutip pendapat Ath Thabari yang menyatakan wanita tidak boleh mengubah bentuk yang telah diciptakan Allah SWT, menambahi maupun menguranginya jika dengan tujuan agar tampil menarik.
Tetapi, ada kondisi tertentu dibolehkan pengubahan bentuk tubuh. Menurut Ath Thabari, dibolehkan mengubah bentuk tubuh jika menimbulkan madarat dan kesusahan.
Sebagai contoh, seseorang punya gigi panjang sehingga menyulitkan dia makan. Orang tersebut boleh mengubah bentek giginya sehingga memudahkannya saat makan.
Abdul Karim Zaidan dalam kitab Al Mufashshal fi Ahkamil Mar'ati wal Baitil Muslim memberikan contoh seorang wanita yang memiliki cacat tubuh akibat terbakar, luka atau penyakit . Cacat tersebut menjadi beban bagi si wanita bahkan mempengaruhi kejiwaannya.
Terkait contoh ini, Zaidan menyatakan wanita tersebut dibolehkan mengubah bentuk tubuhnya meski alasannya adalah agar terlihat cantik . Pendapat tersebut menyiratkan dibolehkannya operasi plastik karena sebab tertentu.
Selengkapnya...
Khalifah Ali Pernah di Ujung Bahaya, Nabi Ajarkan Doa Ini Kamu yang Pacaran, Perhatikan Etika Islam Ini Anak Hasil di Luar Pernikahan Tak Dapat Warisan? Bolehkah Makan 'Rudal' Kambing? Kapan Kondisi Aurat Terbuka Tak Membatalkan Sholat?

thread.title: 中巡江苏赛机场小故事 志愿者忘带接机牌机智补救_中国报道_新浪竞技风暴_新浪网
thread.title_full: 中巡江苏赛机场小故事 志愿者忘带接机牌机智补救_中国报道_新浪竞技风暴_新浪网

posts.author: anonymous
posts.title: 中巡江苏赛机场小故事 志愿者忘带接机牌机智补救_中国报道_新浪竞技风暴_新浪网
posts.text:
志愿者乔治龙 北京时间11月7日，一块缺了一角的白色板子，上面歪歪扭扭写着“江苏公开赛，GOLF字样”，笔迹稚嫩青葱，潦潦草草，文字大小不成比例，GOLF四个字母格外地大。举着这块牌子的是一个带着眼镜、乐呵呵的少年，他站在扬州泰州机场的接机口处，带着点顽皮与搞笑，着实不太正式。
这是怎么回事？一个意外？还是？
举牌接机的男孩儿叫乔龙志，是镇江市句容农校大二的学生。他学的专业就是高尔夫管理服务，因此当中国巡回赛首次落户江苏泰州，即将在华侨城云海湿地体育公园展开江苏公开赛的争夺时，他就义无反顾地报名参加了。被分配到接机工作，他觉得有点意外。“第一次做这个，有点懵。”乔龙志说。不过他仍然带着组委会定制的接机牌开工了，在周一站了10多个小时，接到4位球员。
今天周二，是乔治龙阶级工作最忙碌的一天，大部分球员都选择在今天抵达。一大早出门的他却把接机牌忘在宿舍，待发现时大巴车已经开上了高速，无法回头。“我很着急呀。”乔志龙说，“所以一直想着说怎么补救一下。”
泰州机场不大，走完两头也就几分钟时间。乔志龙却来来回回折腾了近半个小时。“我找了很多人，想说借一块板子。最后在角落里，问工作人员找到了一块，他们不用的。”乔志龙坦诚地回顾道，“然后又在机场前台找他们借了一只黑色的记号笔。是粗的那种，不是一般的签字笔！”
“也没有想太多，就是希望弥补我落了接机牌的错误，也不要耽误了接待球员。”乔龙志说。那么如果找不到白板呢？“那就再想别的办法呗。可惜今天我穿的黑衣服，不能在衣服上写字。”他稀松平常，质朴而真诚的语句流露出单纯的想法。
弥补还是会有疤痕，注定不会完美，但乔龙志积极努力的改善帮助他顺利接到了球员。他很重视接机工作，在他心中，用一块粗劣的接机板成功接到球员总比让球员到处找好。
已经是周二晚上10点了，乔龙志在机场迎来了最后一班球员。但这不是他工作的结束，而是一个崭新的开始。 无数个默默无闻的志愿者如乔龙志一样，在各个岗位上为中国巡回赛的参赛球员们提供服务，他们单纯尽职，一心为了职责，这种精神让我们为他们竖起大拇指，点个赞！
声明：新浪网独家稿件，未经授权禁止转载！

posts.title: 区域协同发展政策密集发布 聚焦体制机制创新_区域_宏观频道首页_财经网
posts.text:
区域协同发展政策密集发布 聚焦体制机制创新
中国证券网讯 国家发改委日前公布部分研究课题公告，其中区域协同发展成为一个重要内容。发改委表示，未来将强化区域协调发展的体制机制创新，整合资源推动形成协同创新共同体，大力推进简政放权和机制创新，提升公共服务共建共享水平，加快破除制约协同发展和要素流动的体制机制障碍，增强区域协同发展新动能。
据经济参考报7日消息，据介绍，未来发改委将围绕推动产业升级转移、打造优势产业集聚区、着力解决突出环境问题等方面，促进京津冀等区域协调发展。其中，京津冀地区将进一步优化空间结构和城镇、人口布局，大力推进内部功能重组，降低北京市城区人口密度，强化京津双城联动，提升区域性中心城市功能，规划布局特色小镇，实现区域良性互动，推进建设以首都为核心的世界级城市群。
日前发布的《京津冀金融发展报告》提出，京津冀三地应当把握雄安新区建设的重大历史机遇，进一步深化区域金融协同发展，强化金融支持，围绕绿色金融、互联网金融、融资租赁等领域共同开展创新探索，打造京津冀金融改革创新高地。
北京市发改委会同天津和河北的发改部门日前印发了京津冀能源协同发展计划，提出能源战略协同、能源设施协同等“八大协同”。
与此同时，长三角城市群发展也在不断深入。长三角创意经济互联互通云平台近日启动，寻找长三角城市群创意产业互联互通、合作发展的契合点。
长三角城市经济协调会办公室主任姚新介绍，创意经济的区域一体化发展，已成为长三角城市群一体化进程的重点内容之一。长三角城市群正在进一步完善区域网络布局，推广大数据、云计算和物联网应用，推动智慧城市试点示范和下一代互联网示范城市的建设，借助于互联网手段，利用共享经济模式，有效提高长三角城市互联互通水平。
不仅是这些国家级的区域协同战略在不断推进，众多地方性的区域协同发展计划也在快速发展。在上周召开的渝西川东经济社会发展协作会上，四川省和重庆市的13个市区县通过了79项合作协议，在创新合作机制上和深化务实合作上不断推进，加快构建形成成渝城市群协调发展新格局。
北京大学首都发展研究院院长李国平表示，区域协调发展战略对经济社会发展起到了巨大作用。但在相当一段时间内，区域间资源、历史等各方面因素造成的发展差异还会存在，促进区域均衡协调发展仍然是一个非常重要的战略方向。未来需创造条件，改善基础设施，加强区域间的联系，建立更加有效的区域协调发展新机制。
据了解，目前，区域发展总体战略和差别化区域政策已经深入实施。新一轮西部大开发稳步推进，一批基础设施等重大标志性工程开工建设。东北振兴持续深化，出台实施新一轮东北振兴战略和若干重大政策举措。中部地区加快崛起，2016年中部地区经济总量占全国的比重提高到20.6%。东部地区率先发展，辐射带动作用更加明显。国家级新区、国家综合配套改革试验区等重要功能平台建设成效不断凸显。2016年，18个国家级新区的GDP总量接近3.9万亿元，绝大多数新区的经济增速大幅领先所在省（市）的平均水平。

thread.title: Officer admits statement omissions in alleged assault case | The Daily Advertiser
thread.title_full: Officer admits statement omissions in alleged assault case | The Daily Advertiser

posts.author: Wagga Court
posts.title: Officer admits statement omissions in alleged assault case | The Daily Advertiser
posts.text:
​ Former Wagga police officer defends assault charge 
An officer has confessed to omitting information in statements relating to the alleged assault of a man by a former Wagga senior constable. 
The hearing continued against Michael John Connor on Tuesday as witness number five was called to the stand. 
Connor, 55, has pleaded not guilty to three common assault charges in relation to the alleged incident on August 27. 
Police claim Connor forcibly punched the alleged victim, Daryl Smith, after he was arrested and handcuffed, in the back of the head at least twice and rammed or threw him head-first into a wall before he was pushed down the stairs. 
On day two of the hearing, Senior Constable Cameron Ellis was granted privilege by magistrate Alex Mijovich in regards to inconsistencies in police statements he provided following the alleged assaults. 
During examination, Senior Constable Ellis told the court he had witnessed Connor punch Mr Smith twice in the head after he was arrested and handcuffed. 
The officer alleged Connor then picked up Mr Smith and threw him against a wall. 
Senior Constable Ellis said Connor then walked Mr Smith, who was dragging his feet, towards the front door. 
“I then saw Mr Smith fall out of Connor’s grasp and into the wall – all I saw was him come out of his grip (down the stairs),” he said. 
“Connor went to bend down and pick him up as I approached and I said – stop I’ll help you.” 
After the incident, Senior Constable Ellis told the court he sat in his police car and called the sergeant on duty, saying: “Something happened after the arrest – Mick punched a bloke.” 
During cross-examination, Connor’s solicitor Ray Hood asked Senior Constable Ellis, who has served as a police officer for just under 15 years, whether he had been taught ethics at the police academy. 
“You had a firm understanding of what to do – you knew you could type out a document and give it to the most senior person, yes?” he asked. 
“I didn’t know the procedures of how to report it,” Senior Constable Ellis replied. 
Mr Hood asked Senior Constable Ellis about his three statements in relation to the incident. 
“Is your statement on September 19 a complete version of events?” he asked. 
“No it’s not,” he said. 
“Was it false?” Mr Hood asked. 
“No, there were just things omitted,” Senior Constable Ellis said.

thread.title: Tanzanian president sacks officials over failure to recall budget figures - Veloxnews
thread.title_full: Tanzanian president sacks officials over failure to recall budget figures - Veloxnews

posts.title: Tanzanian president sacks officials over failure to recall budget figures - Veloxnews
posts.text:
Leave a comment 0 Views 
President John Magufuli of Tanzania sacked two senior officials late on Monday after they failed to recall immediately how much money was allocated by the government in their respective districts for public road construction projects. 
Mr. Magufuli, nicknamed “the Bulldozer” for his infrastructure projects and leadership style, launched his reform drive after he was elected in late 2015. 
He promised to transform an economy hobbled by red-tape and corruption and carry out a major building programme. 
He has sacked thousands of civil servants over the past two years in a crackdown on government inefficiency and corruption. 
A statement issued by the president’s office said the sacked director of the Bukoba Municipal Council, Erasto Mfugale, and the director of the Bukoba Rural Municipal Council, Mwantum Dau, would be assigned to other duties. 
The president’s office did not explain the reasons for the sackings. 
However, the two municipal directors were dismissed just hours after the president summoned them at a public gathering and demanded that they announce exactly how much was allocated by the government for road construction in their districts. 
“You can’t talk to me like that,” Mr. Magufuli said at the launch of a new airport in the lakeside town of Bukoba, which was televised live. 
Ms. Dau had informed the president that she oversees many departments and could therefore not immediately recall the exact budget allocated for road projects. 
The two dismissed officials were not immediately available for comment. 
Mr. Magufuli, who served as the public works minister for nearly 20 years before becoming president, is widely known for having data at his fingertips, and frequently recites monetary figures and exact lengths of roads to their decimal points without referring to notes. 
He has purged more than 20,000 “ghost workers” from the public service payroll and sacked 12,000 government employees for forging their academic transcripts. 
“I will continue to straighten out those few people who have been looting this country in order to ensure that the majority of the population can reap the benefits,” he said. 
Mr. Magufuli has won praise from some Western donors for cracking down on corruption and tax evasion. 
Critics accuse his administration of being increasingly autocratic, but the president declared on Monday that his government “respects democracy.” 
(Reuters/NAN)

thread.title: West Ham Name David Moyes As NewManager
thread.title_full: West Ham Name David Moyes As NewManager

posts.author: Queen Onyebiri (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: West Ham Name David Moyes As NewManager
posts.text:
David Moyes has been named as struggling West Ham's new manager
The English Premier League club have announced the 54-year-old former Everton, Manchester United and Sunderland manager as successor to Slaven Bilic who was sacked on Monday.

Bilic had been expected to see out the season with the Hammers but he was dismissed by joint-chairmen David Sullivan and David Gold in the wake of the 4-1 home defeat by Liverpool on Saturday.

The club have not disclosed the length of Moyes' contract.

Moyes is expected to take training for the first time on Tuesday and his first match will be at Watford on November 19.

In his unveiling video on West Ham's Twitter account, Moyes attempted to rally the fans, saying:
"I'm really looking forward to meeting the supporters, being in the stadium with them. 

"I'm looking forward to seeing them getting right behind the team and my team also. We need the support, we need everyone with us. 

"It's a big job we have in hand now but I'm sure with everybody together we can get the right results between now and the end of the season." West Ham United can confirm the appointment of David Moyes as the Club’s manager. pic.twitter.com/AIOWnHWn27 — West Ham United (@WestHamUtd) November 7, 2017 Hammers joint-chairman David Sullivan said: 
"I would like to welcome David to West Ham United. 

"This is a unique position for David Gold and myself - it is the first time in almost eight years at West Ham United that we have appointed a new manager during the season. 

"We need somebody with experience, knowledge of the Premier League and the players in it, and we believe David is the right man to turn things around and get the best out of the players at the club. 

"He is highly regarded and respected within the game, and will bring fresh ideas, organisation and enthusiasm. 

"He proved with Everton that he has great qualities and we feel that West Ham United is a club that will give David the platform to display those qualities again." 
A statement released by the club read: 
"West Ham United can confirm the appointment of David Moyes as the club’s manager. 

"The 54-year-old Scotsman arrives with tremendous experience and pedigree, having managed in the Premier League for 14 seasons, with eight of the last nine ending in top eight finishes. 

"The former Preston, Everton, Manchester United, Real Sociedad and Sunderland boss has been voted the League Managers’ Association Manager of the Year on three occasions, in 2003, 2005 and 2009, and won 10 Premier League Manager of the Month awards. 

"He enjoyed a magnificent eleven-year tenure at Goodison Park, leading the Toffees to the UEFA Champions League, Europa League and an FA Cup final, before being hand-picked by Sir Alex Ferguson as his successor at Manchester United in the summer of 2013. Moyes will work with the players over the international break before a run of three games he would hope to take points from. West Ham go to Watford, host Leicester and then visit Moyes' former side Everton.

thread.title: Records tumble at​ Kooringal-Wagga Athletics Carnival | Photos | The Daily Advertiser
thread.title_full: Records tumble at​ Kooringal-Wagga Athletics Carnival | Photos | The Daily Advertiser

posts.author: Nicolas Jungfer
posts.title: Records tumble at​ Kooringal-Wagga Athletics Carnival | Photos | The Daily Advertiser
posts.text:
Pictures: Les Smith 
Records dropped like flies at the Kooringal-Wagga Athletics Carnival at Jubilee Park on the weekend. 
Wagga’s Georgia Hallam stole the show when she broke a 20-year-old high jump record with a 1.62 metre leap. 
Not to be outdone, Kooringal-Wagga athlete Michael Greening broke a four-year old record to take out first-place in the boys 16-17 triple jump. 
Kooringal-Wagga’s Godfre Okerenyang was also among the trailblazers, smashed the existing 200 metres sprint record of 25.27 seconds with a stunning time of 23.60. 
Okerenyang also ran a record 11.39 seconds on his way to the 100 metres title, besting the previous record by a full second. 
Fellow Kooringal-Wagga sprinter Isa Taylor-Harvey turned heads, breaking the girls 7s 50 metre sprint record in the heats (9.68 seconds), before taking out the final. 
Wagga Little Athletics Club’s Georgia Hallam also impressed with a record-setting win in the girls 14s 200 metres hurdles, running it in 32.28 seconds.

thread.title: RTE relève la "difficulté" à réduire la part du nucléaire à 50% d'ici 2025
thread.title_full: RTE relève la "difficulté" à réduire la part du nucléaire à 50% d'ici 2025

posts.author: Par AFP
posts.title: RTE relève la "difficulté" à réduire la part du nucléaire à 50% d'ici 2025
posts.text:
RTE relève la "difficulté" à réduire la part du nucléaire à 50% d'ici 2025 RTE relève la "difficulté" à réduire la part du nucléaire à 50% d'ici 2025 Publié le : Mardi 07 Novembre 2017 - 09:25 Mise à jour : Mardi 07 Novembre 2017 - 10:05 © BORIS HORVAT / AFP/Archives - A + A 
Le gestionnaire du réseau électrique RTE a pointé mardi la "difficulté" à réduire la part du nucléaire à 50% de la production d'électricité française d'ici à 2025 pour respecter les objectifs de la loi de transition énergétique. 
"L'atteinte de l'objectif des 50% de nucléaire dans la production d'électricité en 2025 conduit systématiquement à une augmentation des émissions de CO2 du système électrique français", car il faudrait utiliser plus de centrales à gaz et à charbon, souligne RTE dans son bilan prévisionnel. 
Auteur : Par AFP
